item.title: The AVIN™ Review 27/02 - 03/03/2017
item.description:
The AVIN™ Investable Universe

  • Size: 233 (over 319)
  • Value: 1,441,421,421,303,550 ( đ 1.441T)

  1. Market Structure (Size):

    • 08 Large-caps: VNM, SAB, VCB, VIC, GAS, CTG, ROS, BID
    • 12 Mid-caps: HPG, MSN, MBB, FPT, MWG, ROS, STB, CTD, EIB, NT2, DPM, SSI, DHG, KDC
    • 45 Small-caps: PVD, BMP, KBC, HT1, HSG, PNJ, CII, REE, VHC, GMD…
    • 78 Micro-caps: BCI, SHP, HDG, HHS, IMP, STG, LIX, KSB, BHS, PAC…
    • 90 Nano-caps: SRC, HTI, HDC, HAI, SCD, SHI, LBM, TIP, VHG, HAR…

  2. Market Structure (Capital in VND):

    • Large Cap: 750,000bn
    • Mid-Cap: 245,000bn
    • Small-cap: 184,000bn
    • Micro-cap: 92bn
    • Nano-cap: 17bn
